name: Planets Mysteries
description:
Create new planets advance creating first the Moons and Stars, and later you will make your own civilizations, every Rebirth you will make will unlock you new planets to create, some of them will be easy or more difficult to achieve the creation. ¿Are you prepared to this challenge?



Every rebirth you will make, will unlock you new planets and forms of live ¿You will be able to discover all the Mysteries that involves this game?



Coming soon to this game will be, a ported version for PC and more.
